article.title: Computer Sciences Corporation Receives $391 Million Task Order
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Computer Sciences Corporation has been awarded a task order to provide secure managed data center services and information technology managed services to support the operation and maintenance of the Department of Homeland Security's primary data center at NASA's Stennis Space Center. The task order includes six one-year options with possible substitutions, bringing the estimated value to $391 million.
